title: Game Theory
alt: Wait, no, that one also loses. How about a nice game of chess?
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a desk in an office chair typing on his computer. The text appearing above him is implied to be what is displayed on the screen.]
A.I. Loaded
>>> Analyze love[An hourglass appears over the computer as Cueball sits back and wait.][The hourglass continues to display as Cueball shifts in his chair.][A zigzag line from the computer indicates the final reply from the computer to the query.]
Computer: A strange game. The only winning move is not to play.
